mapper.select: SELECT ci.product_id, v.product_name, ci.qty, v.price_excl AS current_unit_price_excl, ci.unit_price_excl AS unit_price_excl_at_add_to_cart, v.price_incl AS unit_price_incl, (v.price_incl * ci.qty) AS subtotal_incl, v.stock, v.status FROM cart_item ci JOIN vw_product_core v ON v.product_id = ci.product_id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId} ORDER BY ci.created_at DESC, ci.product_id DESC FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert:
insert into order_item ( order_id, product_id, product_name, qty, unit_price_incl, subtotal_incl ) values
(#{it.orderId}, #{it.productId}, #{it.productName}, #{it.qty}, #{it.unitPriceIncl}, #{it.subtotalIncl})
